entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
